name: Pass Chance
description: multiplier on how likely the AI is to pass

name: Force Flop Order
description: force the order that cards flop

name: Play Cards In Draw Order
description: ai plays their actions in hand order instead of random order

name: Gold Victory
description: you can win by having this much gold in the bank

name: Units Victory
description: you can win by having this many units in all lanes

name: Kills Victory
description: you can win by killing this many units

name: Shopping Enabled
description: Is the shop enabled?

name: Enable Shot Clock
description: hides the timer around the coin

name: Turn Time Limit
description: time limit for each turn

name: Initial Heroes
description: How many heroes should be deployed at the start of the match

name: Initial Heroes
description: How many heroes should be deployed at the start of the match

name: Initial Mana
description: override the starting mana.

name: Initial Mana
description: override the starting mana

name: Initial Creeps
description: override the starting number of creeps. This is taken from the Creep List

name: Initial Creeps
description: override the starting number of creeps. This is taken from the Creep List

name: Initial Draw
description: override the starting number of cards

name: Initial Draw
description: override the starting number of cards

name: Initial Random Hero Deployment
description: If disabled then hero lane order will be 1,2,3 from deck instead of random (initial deployment starts in the right lane)

name: Initial Hero Lane 1
description: Control which hero starts in lane 1. Initial Random Hero Deployment must be disabled for this to work.

name: Initial Hero Lane 2
description: Control which hero starts in lane 2. Initial Random Hero Deployment must be disabled for this to work.

name: Initial Hero Lane 3
description: Control which hero starts in lane 3. Initial Random Hero Deployment must be disabled for this to work.

name: Initial Hero Lane 2
description: Control which hero starts in lane 2. Initial Random Hero Deployment must be disabled for this to work.

name: Initial Hero Lane 3
description: Control which hero starts in lane 3. Initial Random Hero Deployment must be disabled for this to work.

description: override health for a specific tower

name: Creeps / Turn
description: number of creeps from the Creeps List to deploy

name: Creeps / Turn
description: number of creeps from the Creeps List to deploy

name: Cards / Turn
description: number of cards to draw

name: Cards / Turn
description: number of cards to draw

name: Additional Cards / Turn
description: list of cards to draw each turn

name: Additional Cards / Turn
description: list of cards to draw each turn

name: Creep Development Spread
description: Tries to spread the creep development evenly to all lanes. Creep Deployment Bunch must be disabled for this to work.

name: Creep Deployment Bunch
description: Enabled and all the automatic creeps will bunch toward the left most lane. Creep Development Spread must be disabled for this to work.

name: Creep Deployment Random
description: randomly deployed units will always land across from heroes

name: Hero Deployment
description: disabled to never deploy more heroes

name: Creep List for Deployment
description: list of possible automatic creeps at deployment.

name: Creep List for Deployment
description: list of possible automatic creeps at deployment
